original_text:
Has not my hand made all these things,
    and so they came into being?”
declares the Lord.
“These are the ones I look on with favor:
    those who are humble and contrite in spirit,
    and who tremble at my word.
korean_text: 나 여호와가 말하노라 내 손이 이 모든 것을 지었으므로 그들이 생겼느니라 무릇 마음이 가난하고 심령에 통회하며 내 말을 듣고 떠는 자 그 사람은 내가 돌보려니와

sentences.original_text: Has not my hand made all these things,
sentences.korean_translation: 내 손이 이 모든 것을 만들지 않았느냐,

sentences.original_text: and so they came into being?
These are the ones I look on with favor:
and who tremble at my word.
